Articles.Content:
New Mombasa.. ah, how I missed the good old energy shields. This is still in development to produce further variants.

F-99 Aircraft carrier capable demonstrator UCAV

Download: Extremely short takeoff distances, heavy duty landing gear, two guided smart missiles, high speed, high maneuvrability, long range, low cost, and a variety of other advantages along with a sensor suite and communications package https://www.dropbox.com/s/rbfdqhmpbtnqjgk/F-99%20Combat%20Drone.craft (Feedback is appreciated)
